definitions.definition: In a transparent manner; with nothing hidden .
examples: They conducted their business transparently , solely in public meetings.

definitions.definition: So as to admit light without distortion.
So as to be readily perceived and understood.
examples: Transparently to all, he had nothing of substance to say.

main_definition: In a transparent manner; with nothing hidden .
secondary_definitions: ( manner ) So as to admit light without distortion.
( modal ) So as to be readily perceived and understood.
